definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Most were killed in gas chambers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分都是在毒气室里面被杀害的。

sentences.english: In this way the components of the sample separate from one another.
sentences.chinese: 通过这种原理，毒气样本的不同成分就被区分开来。

sentences.english: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders' poison is under their lips. Selah.
sentences.chinese: 他们使舌头尖利如蛇，嘴里有虺蛇的毒气。

sentences.english: Active carbon adsorbs poisonous gases and impurities in liquids.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭吸附毒气和液体中的杂质。

sentences.english: Some genres of miasma can be made to terrible weapons.
sentences.chinese: 有些毒气可以被作为很可怕的武器。

sentences.english: The men in the coal-mine were asphyxiated by the bad gas.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿坑里的工人们为毒气所窒息。

sentences.english: The poison of vipers is on their lips.

sentences.chinese: 然后警方开始释放毒气。

sentences.english: The boys lived, but the illness induced by their exposure forced them to drop out of school.
sentences.chinese: 他们活了下来，但是毒气造成的疾病让他们被迫退学。

sentences.english: This gas mask can immunize you against poison gas.
sentences.chinese: 防毒面具能使你免遭毒气袭击。

sentences.english: Many factories allow poisonous gas and smoke to escape into the air.
sentences.chinese: 很多工厂都让毒气和毒烟排放到空气里。

sentences.english: The colour comes from a type of carbon and cyanogen, a poisonous gas.
sentences.chinese: 这种颜色来源于一种碳和氰以及一种有毒气体。

sentences.english: Bink had found himself holding his breath again as the poison cloud enveloped him.
sentences.chinese: 宾克发现四周再次毒气弥漫，他也重新屏住呼吸。

sentences.english: Contact with water liberates toxic gas.
The police used tear gas to subdue the rioters.
sentences.chinese: 警察用催泪毒气赶散暴乱者。

sentences.english: He also speculates that slime could protect bacteria from high levels of toxic gas.
sentences.chinese: 他同时猜测粘液能够保护细菌免受有毒气体的侵害。

definition: a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
to breathe in/to suck in/to inhale
